name: Chamber 8 (pastore2, Wesley Chun, Carlo Barths, LvjiangQAQ)
name_original: Chamber 8 (pastore2, Wesley Chun, Carlo Barths, LvjiangQAQ)
description:
Chamber 8 is a tactical puzzle-shooter placed in a futuristic setting where you play as a professional gun for hire. Armed with eight bullets, you must utilize special ammo to finish the job. The only limitation is your imagination. 

DOWNLOAD THE WINDOWS/MAC BUILD FOR BEST PERFORMANCE
